name: The Legend of Teddy Plubo
description:
The Legend of Teddy Plubo is a puzzle game about T.P! Roll through various levels in order to reach the Porcelain Throne! Carefully plan your movements to 

Use the mouse in order to launch Plubo in a Direction.  Make sure not to travel too far or else you will run out of paper!

Grab and pull boxes as Plubo by facing them and then moving in the opposite direction. 

Carefully plan your movements to reclaim your PowerWipe and reach the end.
